JobTitle: Senior Software Engineer - Solution Manager (Remote Eligible)
JobFullDesc:
We're are looking for thoughtful people who are excited about solving tough problems and building software used by millions of people. We value product-oriented engineers who can own and architect features from start to finish. Smartsheet is a Collaborative Work Management platform providing our customers with a no-code way to build and operate Solutions they use to accomplish essential work. Everything from coordinating 1000s of store openings across the globe, to managing vaccine trial and distribution operations, and even coordinating the mars rover build and launch.
On the engineering side, Smartsheet is suite of independent services that rely each other for data and functionality. When a customer builds a solution they are connecting these features together such that the functionality of the solution as a whole depends upon the relational integrity of each part. Solution Manager is a newly forming team looking for you to help build a life-cycle management capability for their no-code solutions.
You will report to our Director, Engineering located in our Bellevue office.
You Will:

Contribute in all stages of the product development and deployment lifecycle
Take technical responsibility for building our services.
Mentor junior engineers on code quality and best practices

You Have:

5+ years software development experience
Proficiency with programming languages such as Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, or similar languages
Familiarity with data structures, storage systems, cloud infrastructure, front-end frameworks
Experience with request and event-based architectures in AWS
Experience building RESTful APIs and eventing pipelines
Legally eligible to work in the U.S. on an ongoing basis
BS in Computer Science, a related field, or equivalent industry experience

Perks & Benefits:

100% employer-paid medical, dental, and vision coverage for full-time employees
Equity - Restricted Stock Units (RSUs) Equity with all offers
Lucrative Employee Stock Purchase Program (15% discount)
401k Match to help you save for your future (50% of your contribution up to the first 6% of your eligible pay)
Monthly stipend to support your work and productivity
15 days PTO to start, plus Flexible Sick Leave
Teleworking options from any registered location in the U.S. (role specific)
Up to 24 weeks of Parental Leave
Personal paid Volunteer Day to support our community
Opportunities for professional growth and development including access to LinkedIn Learning online courses
Company Funded Perks, including a counseling membership, primary care membership, local retail discounts, and your own personal Smartsheet account
